engineers and so we don't push out every single change to production we queue them up and put them on a release check
release train there are a lot of checks and balances before it gets into that main branch they're fast like you can
commit something one one day and it will be in production within an hour
but it goes on that release train we release all of those things out to production so if something goes wrong
we can queue a new release train we can fix that issue and cue the release and it can go out immediately
so in general using tools like github actions and good devops practices mean
that you can fix issues when they happen faster all right
